						Gilchrist, C.L.M, 2020. synthaser

Adjust the shrinkage factor of the plot. Plotted sequence lengths are calculated by dividing total residues by this number (higher numbers = shorter sequences), and thus stay consistent after filtering/between runs.

Click the names of sequences to hide them from the plot. The original view can be restored using the reset filters button.

Domain colours can be changed by clicking the corresponding box in the plot legend.
